name: Sidney HAMLIN, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and State Correctional Institution at Pittsburgh-Records Department

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.

attorneys: Robert A. Greevy, Pa. Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, Tom Bender, Officer, Records Department State Correctional Inst, at Pittsburgh, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
515 A.2d 302
Sidney HAMLIN, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and State Correctional Institution at Pittsburgh—Records Department.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 16, 1986.
Decided Oct. 1, 1986.
Sidney Hamlin, pro se.
Robert A. Greevy, Pa. Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, Tom Bender, Officer, Records Department State Correctional Inst, at Pittsburgh, Pittsburgh, for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
